page.title: 17THE FARMING YEAR JAN-AUG
page.content: {JANUARY}FEEDING,CLEANING OUT CATTLE STALLS, CALVING,LAMBING {FEBRUARY}MUCK SPREADING, FERTILIZING, ROLLING, CHAIN HARROWING, MAINTENANCE OF MACHINERY , BUILDINGS AND BOUNDARIES,CALVING,FEEDING CATTLE, CLEANING OUT,FERTILIZING. {MARCH }HEDGING,CLEARING HAYBINS, CALVING,FEEDING CATTLE,CLEANING OUT CATTLE STALLS. { {APRIL}PUT CATTLE OUT TO GRAZE, HARROWING,FERTILIZING GRASS.FEEDING CATTLE ,CLEANING OUT,ROLLING. {MAY}STOCK CHANGES,TURN CATTLE OUT. SILAGE MAKING, SHEARING,FERTILIZING GRASS. {JUNE}HAY MAKING, SILAGE MAKING, FERTILIZING {JULY}SHEEP CLIPPING, DIP SHEEP, SILAGE MAKING, MAINTENANCE, HAY MAKING {AUGUST}2nd SILAGE CUT, HOLIDAY,STOCK CHANGES,HAY MAKING.
